meanings.definition: Trained to relieve oneself in a designated place within a house.
meanings.sent1: My housetrained dog always goes to the bathroom on the newspaper.
meanings.sent2: The cat was housetrained and never made a mess on the carpet.
meanings.sent3: I wish I was as housetrained as my pet, always knowing where to go.
meanings.sent4: Her housetrained habits were as reliable as the sunrise each morning.
meanings.sent5: Being housetrained means having good bathroom manners indoors.

meanings.definition: Having been taught to behave appropriately inside a house.
meanings.sent1: The housetrained children knew not to jump on the furniture.
meanings.sent2: She was housetrained and never left a mess for others to clean up.
meanings.sent3: The housetrained puppy learned quickly not to chew on shoes.
meanings.sent4: His housetrained behavior was a testament to his upbringing.
meanings.sent5: Being housetrained means knowing how to act respectfully indoors.
